name: b258a26e-9848-5e9f-b610-12a1ede94139
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Mt Cimone, Italy (20130101 - 20140101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Mt Cimone, Italy (20130101 - 20140101)
